introduction: In the northeast of Brazil lies the city of Recife. Known as the shipwreck capital it has enviable resources that help marine conservation and regeneration.These steel giants that lie on the seabed have become artificial reefs and are helping repair the damage done to the underewater ecosystems over decades.Discover how this diving capital of Brazil is helping regenerate its reefs and how the marine wildlife has adapted to their changing habitat.Production company: Gran Angular
